pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Comorbidity Scores // Computing comorbidity scores such as the weighted Charlson score (Charlson, 1987 doi:10.1016/0021-9681(87)90171-8) and the Elixhauser comorbidity score (Elixhauser, 1998 doi:10.1097/00005650-199801000-00004) using ICD-9-CM or ICD-10 codes (Quan, 2005 doi:10.1097/01.mlr.0000182534.19832.83).
